name: New Super REALISTIC Mario Bros.
description:
New Super REALISTIC Mario Bros is a kind of creepypasta game but not really?

It starts off normally, like a classic Super Mario Game, but suddenly, it acts weirdly...

This game was made for an art project, with the intention: 'even a simple game can send messages to the player about the real world'

The builds released right now are the builds I showed in class, it's unfinished and has some cut content. But later updates will add them back! I hope so.

(btw don't mind the file size from french compared to english, nothing changed between them except the text language, must be compression stuff messing with it)
